alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 5:58PM CDT until June 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Saline County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Hamilton County in south central Illinois... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galatia, or 9 miles northwest of Harrisburg, moving east at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR GALATIA ILLINOIS. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Baseball size hail was reported just north of Pittsburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Eldorado, Galatia, Raleigh, Broughton and Muddy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
